arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Kairat Almaty – San Siro Nearly Sold Out
arts.sum: San Siro sets the stage for Wednesday’s ‘David vs Goliath’ Champions League showdown between Inter Milan and Kairat Almaty. According to Tuttosport via FCInterNews, around 66,000 fans will attend Inter’s fourth European game under Cristian Chivu. arts.ttl: Inter Milan Vs Kairat Almaty – Dutch Defender & Italy Midfielder To Return To Starting XI
arts.sum: Stefan de Vrij and Davide Frattesi are reportedly in contention to start in Inter Milan’s home clash against Kairat Almaty tomorrow night.
